content: I want to help build products that solve real world problems.
To that end, I taught myself how to build web apps with React. My work is showcased here [link].
Every day I learn more. Every day my work improves. To see my progress, check out my Github profile [link]. With the structure and guidance of a team, I look forward to accelerating my growth.
I moved to San Francisco to pursue this goal. If you are in SF and looking for a junior developer, I hope you will choose me.
This portfolio consists of web apps built with React or a React-based framework such as Gatsby.

In these apps, I employ the following notable frameworks and libraries: Gatsby, Express, Postgres, Sequelize, Redux, Redux Form, and GraphQL. Projects are hosted on Heroku, Firebase, and Github Pages.
Click a project for more information.
